Title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
Director: Ann Hui, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Ringo Lam
Writer: Kin-Yee Au, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Ringo Lam
Actors: Lawrence Ah-Mon, Emotion Cheung, Tat-Ming Cheung
Plot: Seven of Hong Kong's leading filmmakers have come together to each direct a short film set in Hong Kong during one decade from the 1950s to the future.
